column2:
Get ready to race jetskis with Talking Tom and Friends! Explore the tropical islands as you race your rivals. Dodge obstacles and collect all the coins! Go super fast on your very own jetski and build the perfect beach house. What are you waiting for? Let's go! RACING IS FUN!

***ENJOY THE RUSH OF TALKING TOM JETSKI 2***

- CHOOSE FROM FIVE FREE RIDERS: Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben and Talking Ginger. The whole gang’s here and ready to race!
- COLLECT 25 UNIQUE JETSKIS: Ranging from the fast ‘n’ fierce Tiger Rider to the fabulously pink Sparkle, the unicorn jetski! Choose your very own and be the best rider!
- BOOSTER UPGRADES: Customize your jetski with special parts to compete against opponents who’ll do anything to win.
- RACE IN FIVE DIFFERENT WORLDS: See the spectacular sights by racing in Angela’s Beach Resort, Ben’s Science Lab, Ginger’s Sandcastle, Hank’s Surf Shack, and Tom’s Treasure Island.
- WIN CHESTS: Every victory earns you a chest packed with mystery items. Will you get the prize you want?
- BUILD YOUR OWN BEACH RESORT: Spend your race money on building a unique luxury beach house for each character.
- ANYONE CAN PLAY: The simple control system lets players of all skill levels enjoy the thrill of being a jetski racer.

Talking Tom Jetski 2 is a brand new free game. It’s the sequel to the smash hit racing game, Talking Tom Jetski!

This game gives you more of the jetski action you love, but with better graphics, upgradable jetskis, and exciting rewards to win with every victory. So download it for FREE now!

JUMP ON YOUR JETSKI AND LET’S RACE!

column1: One Fish, Two Fish, HANGED! - A hangman classic
column2:
Do you love old school classic board games but with a modern day era feel to them? If so, then One Fish, Two Fish, Hanged! Is a must download game for you!

Play the classic hang man wordgame but without using a single word or any vocabulary. 

The object of the game is to swipe your screen in the direction that the green fish is facing or in the opposite directing that the red fish is facing. 

The fish are hanging off of a fishing pole above the ocean water. If you swipe the arrow in the wrong direction you will start to hang your scuba diver. If you do not learn from your mistakes, your scuba diver will turn blue in the face and be completely hanged. 

If you get a great score you can share your game replay with your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram with the click of one button.

This free new puzzle game has a Dr. Suess feel to it that kids will love but adults will surely get addicted as well. 

Remember sitting by the lake camp fire when you were a kid playing a boardgame under the moonlight? Now you can get that same enjoyment in the palm of your hand, playing on your living room sofa.

Download this game now for hours of fun!
The Bumper kids are back this time in the slime river. Spike the bumper bully has been slimed and he is madder than ever. Bounce off your friends and avoid the bumper bully in the slime river.
Float Dizzy Bubble through the danger in this Two touch control arcade game

Flip Bottle AR
is the new upcoming Augmented Reality arcade game! In this game, you're supposed to hit the flipping bottle with your finger and split it perfectly in half! Just find a correct spot for Augmented Reality level and start slicing! Try to get highest score! 

Features:
- Real, markerless Augmented Reality system based on NEW IOS 11 AR KIT!
- Play with friends!
- Play inside your room!
- Play outside your house!
- Play in your school!
- Play anywhere you want!

With the new Augmented Reality (AR) Technology, everything is possible! 

This game is using Advanced Procedural Cutting algorithm, which ensures that each and every of your splits is realistic and unique!
Immerse into the new procedural, augmented reality-powered 3D experience and challenge your friends in endless flying bottles hunt!

The most exciting battle of the Ankylosaurus has begun in a faraway island full with dangerous from fierce and frightening dinosaurs in many species. Only the strongest one will survive and become the ultimate dinosaur. To play this game is just to control Ankylosaurus to fight or attack via joystick. This is realistic simulator game of dinosaur battle for survival has begun!!!
In this dangerous island is full of fierce and frightening dinosaurs such as Tyrannosaurus have sharp teeth for biting and tearing flesh, Stegosaurus with spikes on its tail for defence, Velociraptor is clever and nimble, Spinosaurus has a high spines like sails and many more living in this island. The strongest one will survive in this land. It is necessary to hunt and kill the enemy as much as you can to become the ultimate dinosaur and also have to eliminate the giant boss in each zone. 
Ankylosaurus is a genus of armored dinosaur with a large club-like protrusion at the end of its tail. The name means is "fused lizard" in Greek. Its entire top side is heavily protected from carnivores with thick, oval plates fused in its leathery skin. It is the main character in this game .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the character by joystick to kill of enemies
- Upgrade the ability
- Fight boss in each zone.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Smooth realistic character control 
- Missions and upgrade abilities system
- The ultimate character
- Three beautiful world scene 
- Enthusiastic music , noises and sounds
- Beautiful UI , button , animation and effect

Can you handle the fire? Beware of the water or the game will end!

Take control over the fire and discover a new exciting world. The fire realm continues to battle strange magical forces. You must assemble a group of fire warriors and defeat the threat once and for all. Bring back the peace to your realm.

The best puzzle game for the iPhone has entered a new dimension!   Enigmo 2 is the successor to our award winning puzzle game, Enigmo.  There are streams of falling water droplets, plasma and laser beams, and your goal is to get them into their container by using the various puzzle piece that you are given.  Enigmo 2 goes to a new dimension as the puzzles are now three-dimensional!  We've also added tons of new gameplay elements including lasers, plasma, gravetoids, teleporters, gravity inverters, etc.  There are 50 all new levels in Enigmo 2, and an awesome music soundtrack!

The original Enigmo won the 2008 Best iPhone Game award from Apple, among many other awards, and it is one of the Top 20 best selling iPhone apps of all time.  Enigmo 2 raises the bar even farther with increased performance, more dazzling graphics, and even better gameplay.

Watch the video on YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5ZQzm-SBDQ&fmt=22
